title: Fired Denver jail chief Frank Gale secretly recorded call with sheriff
text:
Published By: Denver Post - Today 
In a phone call he did not know was being recorded, interim Denver Sheriff Elias Diggins told former chief Frank Gale he was fired so "they ...
